page.para: We go out. There are man/y things to do to/day.
We walk past the riv/er. This is where we get wa/ter eve/ry day.
First we go to the clin/ic. We are near/ly there.
At the clin/ic I see the nurse. She checks that I am health/y.
The nurse checks my moth/er too. She is as health/y as can be.
Oh no, itâ€™s rain/ing! We have to wait be/fore we can go.
Next we vis/it the shop. We buy food to take home.
We pass a don/key with a load of wood. We need fire/wood to cook to/night.
We are near/ly home. I can see our hen and her chick.
What a bus/y day! It is time to go to sleep.
